```R
library(shiny)
library(Seurat)
library(ShinyCell)
library(stringr)
```

# load data


```R
obj <- readRDS('obj.StromalCell.diet.rds')
obj
obj@meta.data %>% head(n = 2)
conf <- createConfig(obj)
```

# make shiny app


```R
makeShinyApp(obj, 
             conf, 
             gene.mapping = FALSE,
             gex.slot = "data",
             shiny.title = "SexTumorDB: Stromal cell landscape",
             shiny.dir = "StromalShiny/",
             shiny.footnotes = "Datasets covering the total tumor microenvironment can be accessed freely from Zenodo platform",
             enableSubset = TRUE,
             defPtSiz = .5
            )
```


```R
rsconnect::setAccountInfo(name='sextumordb',
                          token='<SECRET>',
                          secret='<SECRET>')
```


```R
rsconnect::deployApp('StromalShiny/', account = 'sextumordb', appName = "stromal")
```
